description: Doing Business As, also known as fictitious name or trade name

registered_address.description: The address filing was registered to

source_url.description: Place where this fact can be verified

sample_date.description: Date on which we know this to be true (usually date this information was retrieved from the source)

retrieved_at.description: The time or date at which the source URL was requested

other_attributes.description: Dump of all other relevant data for which we don't yet have curated schema attributes
